name: Forsaken Memories
description:
This game is heavily inspired from elements of the horror game "Emily Wants to Play". In order to avoid death, players have to follow specific set of actions for each monsters encountered.  These actions include:

- Not moving for a few seconds

- Getting out from the room where the source is in as quick as possible

-Or staying in the room until the source stops manifesting

-and more...

Enjoy and have fun!
